description: Imaginary Rabbits: imaginary part of a(0)=I; a(1)=-I; a(n)=a(n-1)+I*a(n-2).
references: Charles Gely, "Lapins imaginaires et valeurs propres". Quadrature Quarterly #30.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,-1,0,-1).
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1, -1, -1, -1]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 2*Self(n-1) - Self(n-2) - Self(n-4): n in [1..50]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 23 2012
